column4: hi I m trying to install Ubuntu 11.10 using A live cd but it can't see windows7 partition it says that all my hd /dev/sda0 is unallocated any idea ?
That usually means that you have an invalid partition table. Can you pastebin the output of "sudo parted -l"?
That first error is the one causing problems. fixparts is a utility which can fix this.
